archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0887
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Revenue Assurance Analyst I want be able access all MVNO customer information, usage and charges so that we can ensure the correct charging of all our MVNO customers

properties.value: MVNOs not part of Target Horizon 1? Kiri: Yes MVNO is Horizon 1, feature_32 in roadmap (I had bruce confirm this and Ive asked for it to be reworded so its clear)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
